english_example_sentence: If you show your mother your new dress, she will like it very much.
russian_example_sentence: Если ты покажешь своей маме свое новое платье, ей очень понравится.
turkish_example_sentence: Annene yeni elbiseni göstersen, o çok beğenir.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Annene yeni elbiseni ______, o çok beğenir.
